Name: AIDA: The Beginning of the Story
About the game: AIDA: The Beginning of the Story is first-person adventure puzzle game. Interact with objects, solve puzzles, and go through the story. Reveal the secret of the queen's death and save the kingdom in danger. *Game Features -First person point of view, you can immerse yourself in the story. -You can change the operation with the mouse right click. Use it to suit your situation. -You can change mouse sensitivity in settings. -There are various puzzles and objects waiting for each map. -Watch the antique medieval space.
